title: Content Creator Job at Oneland Africa
content:
Oneland Africa is a leading real estate company committed to helping Nigerians own premium properties across Nigeria. Oneland sees to the sales of developed Housing units, off plan sales, lease/letting and Facility Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Are you confident in front of the camera and have a flair for storytelling?
	Do you consider yourself smart, creative, and camera-friendly? Then this opportunity is for you!
	We're on the hunt for a Content Creator to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be good-looking, articulate, and bursting with creative ideas to shape our content across multiple platforms.


Key Responsibilties


	Create engaging video and photo content for our digital platforms
	Develop and pitch creative content ideas that align with our brand voice
	Represent the brand confidently in front of the camera
	Stay updated on trends to keep content fresh and relevant
	Collaborate with the team to drive content strategy.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s Degree with 1 - 3 years of work experience.
	Strong on-camera presence and communication skills
	Experience in content creation (reels, skits, voiceovers, product storytelling, etc.)
	Young, Creativity, Confidence, and a sense of humour
	Basic video editing skills is a plus
	A portfolio showcasing your previous work.


Salary
N50,000 - N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their portfolio to: hr@oneland.africa using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: We’re excited to see your creativity!

title: Senior Sales Executive Job at Willers Solutions Limited
content:
Willers Solutions Limited - Our mission is to deliver tangible business solutions to our clients that are consistent with value maximisation, innovation and integrity, leveraging our pool of competent and inspired personnel.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Sales Executive

Job Location: Warri, Delta

Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and execute sales strategies for protective/marine coating products.
	Build long-term relationships with major accounts, contractors, and technical influencers.
	Deliver technical presentations, guide product application discussions, and coordinate field trials.
	Lead project targeting efforts and ensure alignment with business goals.
	Collaborate with internal teams to address client needs and ensure service delivery.
	Track sales pipeline, monitor progress, and ensure monthly/quarterly targets are met.
	Provide market feedback on product performance, customer trends, and competitive activity.


Education & Qualifications


	B.Sc / B.Tech in Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, or a related field (AMPP Level 1/2 is a plus).
	5–6 years of proven experience in sales of protective coatings, marine paints, or related industrial chemicals.
	Strong expertise in liquid coatings, including product specifications, applications, and standards.
	Experience handling B2B clients, industrial projects, or marine sector accounts.
	Excellent presentation, negotiation, and client management skills.
	Must be self-driven, strategic, and comfortable working independently.
	Willingness to travel extensively.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@willerssolutions.com using "Senior Sales Executive" as the subject of the mail.

title: Technical Support Officer Job at Techdroid Integrated Services
content:
Techdroid Integrated Services is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Technical Support Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time 

Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Install, configure, and maintain computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers, and scanners.
	Monitor and maintain the organization’s IT infrastructure, including servers, internet, and email systems.
	Provide first-line support to staff and customers on hardware and software-related issues.
	Respond to and log calls, escalating calls as required with key support vendors and clients
	Maintain records/logs of repairs and fixes, and maintenance schedule.
	Provide one-on-one training when required
	Troubleshoot system and network problems and diagnose and solve hardware/software faults.
	On-site installation, set-up, support, and delivery of hardware and software to the client
	Ensure security of data, network access, and backup systems.
	Set up new user accounts and profiles and deal with password issues.
	Manage software licenses and updates, and ensure compliance with IT  policies.
	Recommend and implement improvements to IT systems and  processes.
	Liaise with IT vendors and service providers to ensure timely support and  maintenance.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
	Minimum of 1-3 years of experience in a similar IT support or systems administration role.
	Strong understanding of computer systems, mobile devices, operating systems (Windows/Mac), and networks (LAN/WAN).
	Experience with troubleshooting hardware, software, and network issues.
	Familiarity with Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, antivirus, and backup solutions.
	Knowledge of basic cybersecurity practices and data protection 
	principles.
	Strong problem-solving, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team-oriented  environment.
	Experience with ERPs or business management systems.
	Basic knowledge of web and server administration.
	Certifications such as CompTIA A+, Network+, or Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP) are an added advantage.
	Professional fluency in English is essential, both written and spoken.
	Successful candidate MUST be available to resume immediately.
	We expect applications and CVs to come from applicants living in any of these areas in Lagos: Ikeja, Oshodi, Ilupeju, Anthony, Dopemu, Agege, Maryland, and Ojota axis.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@techdroidsystems.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: General Manager Job at Excel and Grace Consulting
content:
Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager
Job Location: Iyana-Ipaja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Distribution / FMCG / Consumable Products

Position Overview


	We are seeking an experienced and strategic General Manager (GM) to lead the overall operations of our company, which specializes in the distribution of consumable products.
	The GM will be responsible for driving operational excellence, managing supply chain efficiency, ensuring customer satisfaction, and leading cross-functional teams to achieve business goals.
	This role requires a hands-on leader with strong business acumen and a deep understanding of distribution dynamics and FMCG market trends.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee daily operations across logistics, warehousing, procurement, sales, and customer service.
	Streamline supply chain processes to ensure timely and cost-effective product delivery.
	Develop and implement business strategies to drive growth, profitability, and market share.
	Identify and capitalize on new distribution opportunities and partnerships.
	Foster a culture of accountability, performance, and continuous improvement.
	Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to drive product visibility and customer acquisition.
	Monitor market trends, competitor activity, and customer feedback.
	Prepare and manage budgets, forecasts, and financial reports.
	Monitor KPIs and financial metrics to ensure profitability and cost control.
	Lead, mentor, and develop a high-performing team across departments.
	Ensure compliance with industry regulations, health & safety standards, and company policies.
	Mitigate operational risks and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders.


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain, or related field (MBA preferred).
	Minimum of 8–10 years of leadership experience, preferably in FMCG, distribution, or logistics sectors.
	Proven track record of managing operations, P&L responsibility, and driving business growth.
	Strong leadership, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
	Proficient in ERP systems and Microsoft Office Suite.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: eandg.tprecruiters@gmail.com using "General Manager-Iyana-Ipaja" as the subject of the email.
